data.title: Fast but a little pricey
data.text: JJ is very fast sandwich maker no matter where you go. That being said I wish there was a little more quality to the sandwich. It tastes like it is rushed, mainly the bread is the massive filler on the sandwich. Compared to Subway, which takes slightly more time and easier to customize real time. Prices are somewhat higher overall.

data.title: Typical JJs
data.text: Fresh sandwiches made to order.  Friendly staff.  Very affordable compared to other options.  Fresh bread and the hot peppers are delicious!  The online app works great, food is made and ready within minutes.
